list_definition.definition: to interrupt or take attention away from

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’m sorry, am I disturbing you?
Sorry to disturb you, have you seen Alan anywhere?
This news has disturbed me very much.

list_definition.definition: to stir up or throw into confusion

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A violent storm disturbed the surface of the lake.
